item.title: Radio station with RDS function on Raspberry Pi
item.description: Today I will demonstrate you how to install the FM radio transmitter on Raspberry Pi. It is not just a transmitter! It supports RDS function with all its options (PS, RT, TA/TP). So do it! The only thing we need to know is that the transmitter needs an antenna. Of course, you can broadcast from GPIO goldpin, but the range of such a solution is barely a few meters. Simply attach the short cables to the GPIO4 (4 pin inside) to extend the range up to a hundred meters.
